title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: KeithM: I would recommend that Speaker Pelosi require the entire members of the House of Representatives to read and discuss the United States Constitution before embarking on an Impeachment of the sitting president. The constitution is clear on the responsibilities of each section of our republic. We the people are in charge of our government. Elected members are asked to represent the people in good faith and to preserve life, liberty and pursuit of happiness. Each elected member of congress were required to take an oath of office and pledge to honor and uphold the United States Constitution. THe House speaker is required to oversee that each member is a faithful member and represents the people to the best of their ability.
